subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which of the following Rajput kingdoms was part of the Rajputana province?
question_hi: राजपूताना के किस राज्यों में राजपूताना का अधिकारी है।
explanation_en: Jodhpur was one of the major Rajput kingdoms that formed part of the Rajputana province during its existence.
explanation_hi: जोधपुर एक मुख्य राज्य राजपूताना का अधिकारी थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous palace was built during the reign of Raja Man Singh I in Jaipur?
question_hi: राजा मन सिंह I के बनाए गए किसी मैंसिंग का नाम क्या है?
D_en: Cenotaph of Maharaja Ram Singh II
D_hi: महाल राम सिंग II के कंत्रों
explanation_en: Amber Fort is a famous palace built during the reign of Maharaja Man Singh I. It was constructed by Raja Man Singh I in the early 16th century.
explanation_hi: अमेर महाल Maharaja Man Singh I ने स्प्रेकार की दिल्ली को बना करेंग के वर्षीय स्प्रेकारों
अमेर महाल महाल मंजुर के वर्षीय स्प्रेकारों

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who laid the foundation of the first motorable road in Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Maharana Pratap laid the foundation of the first motorable road in Rajasthan. Bhanwar Singh and Bikaji Ka Malhargarh are also significant historical forts in the state, but Maharana Pratap is known for introducing the first motorable road.
explanation_hi: महाल प्रताप ने राजस्थान मोटरोबल की पहल के बनोवार सिंग और बिकाजी के मालहारगड़ भी बहारगरंग और बिकाजी बहारगड़ भी बहारगरंग
explanation_en: Bhanwar Singh and Bikaji Ka Malhargarh are famous forts in Rajasthan, but Maharana Pratap introduced the concept of motorable roads in the state.
